body: This +3 chainmail is so fine and light that it can be worn under normal clothing without betraying its presence. It has a maximum Dexterity bonus of +8, an armor check penalty of –2, and an arcane spell failure chance of 15%. It is considered light armor and allows the wearer to use fly on command (as the spell) once per day.
name: Celestial Armor
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Specific Magic Armor and Shields/Specific Magic Armor/Celestial Armor
